content.text: Match ends, Mallorca 4, Almería 1.
Second Half ends, Mallorca 4, Almería 1.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Kalu Uche (Almería) because of an injury.
Offside, Almería. Corona tries a through ball, but Carlos García is caught offside.
Corona (Almería) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Jonathan de Guzmán (Mallorca).
Foul by Gonzalo Castro (Mallorca).
Míchel Macedo (Almería) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Goal!  Mallorca 4, Almería 1. Michael Pereira (Mallorca) right footed shot from outside the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Gonzalo Castro.
Dangerous play by Modeste M'Bami (Almería).
Michael Pereira (Mallorca) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

Santiago Acasiete (Almería) is shown the yellow card.
